typesOfGames.title: Types of Brain Training Games
typesOfGames.subtitle: Discover the science behind each category.

nback.title: N-Back Games
nback.description: The gold standard for working memory training. Challenges you to remember sequences of stimuli.

schulte.title: Schulte Tables
schulte.description: Grid-based visual search task. Enhances peripheral vision, reading speed, and selective attention.

stroop.title: Stroop Tests
stroop.description: Classic psychological test measuring cognitive flexibility and inhibition control.

memory.title: Short-Term Memory
memory.description: Exercises designed to expand your immediate recall capacity and span.
